entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 4:30 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
